scripts.compile: cd contracts && forge build && find ../server/eth/contracts ../ui/contracts -maxdepth 0 -type d -exec cp out/FlightSuretyApp.sol/FlightSuretyApp.json out/FlightSuretyData.sol/FlightSuretyData.json out/FlightSuretyOracles.sol/FlightSuretyOracles.json {} \;
scripts.deploy:server: git add . && git commit -m Heroku && git subtree push --prefix server heroku master
